navigation.dashboardVoice: Dashboard. Duba bayanin gonarku da ƙididdiga.
navigation.calendarVoice: Kalanda. Duba da kuma tsara jadawalin gonarku.
navigation.fieldsVoice: Gonaki. Sarrafa amfanin gonarku da wuraren shuka.
navigation.expensesVoice: Kashe Kuɗi. Bi diddigin farashin ku da sayayya.
navigation.incomeVoice: Kudin Shiga. Bi diddigin kudin shigar gonarku da sayayya.
navigation.tasksVoice: Ayyuka. Sarrafa jerin ayyukan gonarku da ayyuka.
navigation.analyticsVoice: Nazari. Duba fahimtar AI da hasashe.
navigation.marketplaceVoice: Kasuwa. Saya da sayar da amfanin gona tare da sauran manoma.
navigation.pestVoice: Yaƙi da Kwari. Gano da sarrafa cututtukan amfanin gona da kwari.
navigation.chatVoice: Mataimakin AI. Samu shawarar noma da shawarwari.
navigation.knowledgeVoice: Ilimi. Koyi hanyoyin noma mafi kyau da jagororin.
navigation.communityVoice: Al'umma. Haɗu da sauran manoma, raba ilimi.
navigation.messagesVoice: Saƙonni. Aika da karɓi saƙonni da sauran manoma.
navigation.settingsVoice: Saiti. Saita bayanan gonarku da abubuwan da kuke so.
navigation.weatherVoice: Yanayin Yanayi. Duba yanayin yanzu da hasashen.
navigation.marketsVoice: Kasuwanni. Duba farashin kayayyaki da yanayin kasuwa.

offline.mode: Yanayin Ba Tare da Yanar Gizo
offline.message: Ba tare da yanar gizo - Za a daidaita canje-canje lokacin da aka sake haɗawa
offline.backOnline: An Sake Haɗuwa - Ana daidaita bayanai...

dashboard.title: Bayanin Gona
dashboard.noRecentActivity: Babu ayyukan kwanan nan. Fara ta ƙara gonaki, kashe kuɗi, ko ayyuka!
dashboard.revenueVsExpenses: Kudin Shiga da Kashe Kuɗi (Watanni 6 da suka gabata)

quickActionsSection.addFieldVoice: Ƙara Gona. Danna don zuwa shafin Gonaki da ƙara sabuwar gona.
quickActionsSection.addExpenseVoice: Ƙara Kashe Kuɗi. Danna don zuwa shafin Kashe Kuɗi da rikodin farashi.
quickActionsSection.viewReportsVoice: Duba Rahotanni. Danna don ganin nazarin gonarku da rahotannin kuɗi.

fields.manageDesc: Sarrafa gonakinka kuma bi diddigin ci gaban amfanin gona
fields.signInVoice: Shiga don Ƙara Gona. Kuna buƙatar shiga kafin ku ƙara gonaki sababbi.
fields.addFieldVoice: Ƙara Gona. Danna don ƙara sabuwar gona da kuma bin diddigin amfanin gonarka.
fields.editVoice: Gyara gona. Danna don gyara bayanan wannan gona.
fields.deleteVoice: Goge gona. Gargadi: Wannan zai goge wannan gona gaba ɗaya.
fields.closeVoice: Rufe. Danna don rufe wannan fom ba tare da ajiye ba.
fields.cancelVoice: Soke. Danna don rufe wannan fom ba tare da ajiye kowane canji ba.
fields.updateVoice: Sabunta Gona. Danna don ajiye canje-canjen ku ga wannan gona.
fields.addNewVoice: Ƙara Gona. Danna don ƙara wannan sabuwar gona ga gonarku.
fields.noFields: Babu gonaki har yanzu. Ƙara gonar farko don farawa!

expenses.monitorDesc: Bi diddigin kuma sarrafa kashe kuɗin gona
expenses.noExpensesYet: Ba a yi rikodin kashe kuɗi ba tukuna. Ƙara kashe kuɗin farko don farawa!

income.trackDesc: Bi diddigin kudin shiga da ribar gona
income.noIncomeYet: Ba a yi rikodin kudin shiga ba tukuna. Ƙara shigarwar farko don farawa!

tasks.scheduleDesc: Tsara da kuma bin diddigin ayyukan gona
tasks.noTasksYet: Babu ayyuka har yanzu. Ƙara aiki na farko don farawa!
tasks.taskTitlePlaceholder: misali, Shafa taki ga Gonar Arewa

weather.title: Yanayin Yanayi
weather.refreshVoice: Sabunta Yanayin Yanayi. Danna don sabunta bayanan yanayi.

tips.highTemp: Zafin jiki mai yawa a yau. Tabbatar amfanin gona sun sami isasshen ruwa, musamman lokacin rana.
tips.rainExpected: Ana tsammanin ruwan sama. Lokaci mai kyau don rage ban ruwa da kuma shirya tsarin magudanar ruwa.
tips.highWind: Saurin iska mai yawa. Guji fesa kuma duba lalacewar amfanin gona.
tips.highHumidity: Yawan danshi mai yawa. Kula da amfanin gona don cututtukan fungi kuma tabbatar da isasshen iska.

weatherAlerts.favorable: Yanayin yanayi yana da kyau don noma
weatherAlerts.recommendedActions: Ayyukan da ake Ba da Shawara:

calendar.title: Kalandar Gona
calendar.subtitle: Tsara da bin diddigin ayyukan noma

market.title: Farashin Kasuwa
market.compareDesc: Kwatanta farashin ƙasa da ƙasa kuma ƙara farashin kasuwarka na gida
market.pageVoice: Shafin Farashin Kasuwa. Duba farashin kayayyaki na ƙasa da ƙasa kuma ƙara farashin kasuwarka na gida don kwatantawa.
market.refreshVoice: Sabunta Farashin Kasuwa. Danna don sabunta bayanan kasuwa.
market.selectCommodities: Danna sunaye na kayayyaki a sama don nunawa/ɓoye yanayin
market.basedOnData: Dangane da bayanan kasuwa na yanzu

instructions.addLocal: Danna "Ƙara Na Gida" akan kowane kaya don shigar da farashin daga kasuwarka na gida
instructions.toggle: Canza tsakanin "Na Duniya" da "Na Gida" don kwatanta farashin
instructions.private: Farashin gidanka an ajiye su a na'urar ka kuma sun kasance masu zaman kansu gareka
instructions.update: Sabunta farashin akai-akai don bin diddigin yanayin kasuwa a yankin ku

analytics.title: Nazarin AI
analytics.subtitle: Fahimtar hasashe don inganta ayyukan noma
analytics.noFieldsYield: Babu gonaki masu aiki don hasashen girbi.
analytics.noInvestmentData: Babu bayanan zuba jari don nazarin ROI.
analytics.noRecommendations: Babu shawarwarin shuka da ake samu.
analytics.recommendedDate: Ranar da ake Ba da Shawara
analytics.considerations: Abubuwan da za a Yi La'akari:
analytics.recordHarvestSales: Yi rikodin sayar da girbi don ganin yanayin farashi.

marketplace.title: Kasuwa
marketplace.subtitle: Saya da sayar da amfanin gona kai tsaye tare da sauran manoma
marketplace.noListingsCreate: Zama na farko don ƙirƙira jeri!
marketplace.noListingsFilter: Gwada daidaita binciken ko tacen ku.
marketplace.priceNote: An jera farashin cikin KES. Za a nuna su a cikin kudin da mai amfani ya fi so.
marketplace.descriptionPlaceholder: Ƙarin bayani game da amfanin gona...
marketplace.imageUrlPlaceholder: Shigar da URL na hoto (misali, https://example.com/image.jpg)
marketplace.imageNote: Ƙara har zuwa hotuna 5. Yi amfani da sabis na ajiyar hotuna kamar Imgur ko Google Photos.
marketplace.mustSignIn: Dole ne ku shiga don ƙirƙira jeri
marketplace.validateFields: Don Allah cika duk filayen da ake buƙata da kyawawan darajoji
marketplace.confirmDelete: Kun tabbata kuna son goge wannan jeri?
marketplace.deleteError: An kasa goge jeri. Don Allah sake gwadawa.
marketplace.markedAsSold: An yi alamar jeri an sayar kuma an yi rikodin kudin shiga!
marketplace.markAsSoldError: An kasa yi alamar an sayar. Don Allah sake gwadawa.

chat.title: Mataimakin Gona
chat.placeholder: Tambaye ni komai game da noma...
chat.example2: Ta yaya zan magance cutar ganye?
chat.example3: Wane taki ne mafi kyau ga tumatir?

pest.diagnosisDesc: Loda hotuna ko bayyana alamomi don bincike na AI
pest.clickUpload: Danna don loda ko ja da sauka
pest.describePlaceholder: Bayyana alamomin: launin ganye, tabo, bushewa, kamannin kwaro, wuraren da suka shafa...
pest.uploadPrompt: Loda hotuna ko bayyana alamomi don samun bincike
pest.recommendedTreatment: Maganin da aka Ba da Shawara
pest.disclaimerText: Wannan bincike ne mai amfani da AI kuma yakamata a yi amfani da shi azaman jagora. Don yanayi mai mahimmanci ko bincikewar da ba ta da tabbas, don Allah tuntuɓi jami'in noma na yankin ku.
pest.provideInput: Don Allah samar da bayani ko loda hotuna
pest.analyzeFailed: An kasa yin nazari. Don Allah duba saitin API ɗinku.

community.title: Al'umma
community.subtitle: Haɗu da manoma, raba ilimi, kuma ku koyi tare
community.noPostsDesc: Zama na farko don fara tattaunawa!
community.question: Tambaya
community.contentPlaceholder: Raba gogewarku, yi tambaya, ko ba da shawarwari masu amfani...
community.messagePrompt: Aika saƙo zuwa {{name}} - Wannan zai buɗe sashen saƙonni

messages.title: Saƙonni
messages.selectConversationDesc: Zaɓi tattaunawa daga jerin don fara aika saƙonni

knowledge.title: Ilimi
knowledge.subtitle: Koyi hanyoyin noma mafi kyau
knowledge.testVoice: Gwada Murya a Harshen Da Aka Zaɓa
knowledge.languageNote: Shigar da murya da fitarwa za su daidaita da harshen da ka zaɓa. Danna "Gwada Murya" don ji samfurin.
knowledge.signInToLike: Don Allah shiga don so labarai
knowledge.signInToBookmark: Don Allah shiga don sanya alamar shafi labarai
knowledge.updateError: An kasa sabuntawa. Don Allah sake gwadawa.

settings.title: Saiti
settings.subtitle: Sarrafa bayanin gonarku da abubuwan da kuke so
settings.searchHint: Rubuta sunan birni sannan danna Nema don samun matsayin
settings.currencyWarning: Idan kashe kuɗin ku suna nuna darajoji marasa daidai bayan canza kuɗi, danna maido.
settings.taskRemindersDesc: Samu tunatarwa game da ayyukan da ke zuwa
settings.lowInventoryDesc: Faɗakarwa lokacin da kaya suka yi ƙasa
settings.weatherAlertsDesc: Sabuntawa masu mahimmanci game da yanayi
settings.voiceEnabled: An kunna shigar da murya da karanta da babbar murya
settings.ttsUnavailable: Ba a tallafa shi a wannan browser
settings.sttUnavailable: Ba a tallafa shi a wannan browser
settings.testVoice: Maraba zuwa AgroAfrica! Mataimaki na noma mai wayo yana shirye don taimaka muku sarrafa gonarku yadda ya kamata.
settings.voiceGuide: Yadda ake Amfani da Fasalolin Murya

voiceGuideItems.readAloud: Karanta da Babbar Murya: Nemi alamar speaker kusa da rubutu don jin ana karantawa
voiceGuideItems.voiceInput: Shigar da Murya: Danna maɓallan microphone don yin magana maimakon rubuta
voiceGuideItems.accessibility: Samun Dama: An ƙera fasalolin murya don sauƙaƙe amfani da app
voiceGuideItems.browserSupport: Tallafin Browser: Fasalolin murya suna aiki mafi kyau a Chrome da Edge

restoreModal.title: Maido Bayanan Kuɗi
restoreModal.warning: Wannan zai maido bayanan kashe kuɗi da kudin shiga zuwa daidaitaccen tsarin kuɗi.
restoreModal.instructions: Yi amfani da wannan idan adadinku ya bayyana ba daidai ba bayan canza saitin kuɗi.

settings.locationUpdated: An sabunta wuri! Kar ku manta ajiye saitin ku.
settings.notFound: Ba a iya samun wuri. Gwada zama mafi cikakke.
settings.searchError: An kasa neman wuri. Don Allah sake gwadawa.
settings.geoNotSupported: Browser ɗin ku baya tallafa wa geolocation
settings.permissionDenied: An hana samun wuri. Don Allah bada izini a saitin browser ɗinku.
settings.offlineData: Bayanan Ba Tare da Yanar Gizo
